name: Encrypto Encrypted File
summary: Learn about .CRYPTO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To create a CRYPTO file with MacPaw Encrypto, drag and drop a file or folder onto Encrypto, set a password (and an optional hint), and click Encrypt. To open a CRYPTO file with MacPaw Encrypto, drag and drop the CRYPTO file onto Encrypto, enter the password, and click Decrypt.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
